scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config webpack.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.serve: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3005 --no-hot
scripts.serve:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config webpack.config.js --mode development --port 3005
scripts.serve:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3005 --no-hot
scripts.e2e: pnpm exec cypress run --project . --e2e --config baseUrl=http://127.0.0.1:3005 --browser chrome
scripts.e2e:development: pnpm exec cypress open --project . --e2e --config baseUrl=http://127.0.0.1:3005 --browser electron
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm exec concurrently "lsof -i :3005 || pnpm --filter bundle-size run serve" "sleep 4 && pnpm --filter bundle-size run e2e"
scripts.getsize: pnpm --filter bundle-size run build:production && sleep 1 && if [ -f dist/remoteEntry.js ] ; then ls -lah dist/remoteEntry.js | awk '{print "remoteEntry.js size: " $5}' && gzip -c dist/remoteEntry.js | wc -c | awk '{print "gzip size: " $1 " bytes"}' && brotli -c dist/remoteEntry.js | wc -c | awk '{print "brotli size: " $1 " bytes"}' ; else echo "remoteEntry.js not found" ; fi
